proposals.product_summary: Athletic sneaker with textile upper and rubber outsole.
assumptions: Classification based on textile upper and rubber outsole.
Value is primarily in the upper.

baseline.rationale: Footwear with textile upper, rubber outsole, athletic use.

mutations.title: Add felt/fabric outer sole coverage
mutations.change: Increase felt coverage to qualify for different subheading.
mutations.legal_rationale: Coverage changes can alter outsole material.

mutations.title: Shift upper to predominantly rubber/plastic
mutations.change: Reinforce upper with molded TPU panels.
mutations.expected_effect: Potential shift to rubber/plastic upper classification.

mutations.title: Add textile outer sole cover
mutations.expected_effect: Possible reclassification under textile outsole notes.
mutations.legal_rationale: Outer sole coverage can drive heading.

mutations.title: Relocate final assembly to qualifying country
mutations.change: Complete substantial transformation in FTA partner.
mutations.expected_effect: Eligibility for preferential rate if rules met.
mutations.legal_rationale: Origin rules allow reduced duty when met.

mutations.title: Package as a set with accessories
mutations.change: Bundle with gaiters/insoles as a set.

optimized.rationale: Upper material shift lowers heading and ad valorem rate.
